content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- **Iron Ore Mining Section**: 
  - Burner Mining Drill at position (-14.0, -53.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -54.5) for storage of mined iron ore.
- **Iron Plate Production Section**:
  - Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) for smelting iron ore into iron plates.
  - Wooden Chest at position (1.5, 0.5) for storing iron plates.
  - Burner Inserter at position (2.5, 0.5) for transferring items between chests.

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (53.0, -83.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (52.5, -84.5) for storing mined coal.

### Iron Plate Processing Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-19.0, -65.0) and another at position (-21.0, -62.0) for smelting operations.
- Burner Inserter at position (-20.5, -66.5) and another at position (-17.5, -64.5) for transferring items.
- Wooden Chest at position (-16.5, -64.5) for storing processed iron plates.

### Transport Belt Network
Consists of several BeltGroups:
- BeltGroup connecting positions (-21.5, -64.5) to (-21.5, -66.5).
- BeltGroup connecting positions (-14.5, -63.5) to (-14.5, -65.5).
- BeltGroup connecting positions (-17.5, -62.5) to (-17.5, -64.5).
- BeltGroup connecting positions (-16.5, -64.5) to (-12.5, -58.5).
- BeltGroup connecting positions (-14.5, -54.5) to (-17.5, -59.5).

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Placing Entities Too Far
- Ensure you are within the maximum allowed distance (10 units) from the target position before placing an entity. Move closer to the target position to avoid placement errors.

### Errors when Picking Up Non-existent Entities
- Double-check the position of the entity you intend to pick up to ensure it exists at the specified location. This will prevent errors related to attempting to pick up non-existent entities.
